string-array.name: insults
string-array.item: Where did you get that haircut? The toilet store?
you more useless than ann franks drum kit
It looks like your face was on fire and someone tried to put it out with a fork
Everyone who has ever loved you was wrong
I hope you outlive your children
Why dont you slip into something more comfortable? Like a coma.
Your birth certificate is a letter of apology from the abortion clinic.
Did your parents ever ask you to run away from home?
I dont know what your problem is, but I bet its hard to pronounce.
Do you ever wonder what life would be like if youd had enough oxygen at birth?
You are not the person Mr Rogers believed you could be.
Your mother was a hamster and your father smelt of elderberries!
